mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VisitorBooking (visitorName, visitorTime, IDCard, address, companyName, operaName, phone, reason, sex, cardUserId, userGroup, userName) VALUES (#{visitorName}, #{visitorTime}, #{IDCard}, #{address}, #{companyName}, #{operaName}, #{phone}, #{reason}, #{sex}, #{cardUserId}, #{userGroup}, #{userName});
mapper.update: UPDATE VisitorBooking SET visitorName = #{visitorName}, visitorTime = #{visitorTime}, IDCard = #{IDCard}, address = #{address}, companyName = #{companyName}, operaName = #{operaName}, phone = #{phone}, reason = #{reason}, sex = #{sex}, cardUserId = #{cardUserId}, userGroup = #{userGroup}, userName = #{userName} WHERE id = #{id};
